title: FINAL t206 for Sale - Chase (holding trophy) PSA 2. Now $125 !

posts.post_title: FINAL t206 for Sale - Chase (holding trophy) PSA 2. Now $125 !
posts.post_content:
Trying to raise funds for a larger purchase so I'm offering up some nice t206 HOFers, etc... 

t206 Cobb (Bat off Shoulder) PSA 1 -- SOLD!!
t206 Walter Johnson (Hands at Chest) PSA 1 -- SOLD!!
t206 Bender w/ trees (CYCLE!!) SGC 1 -- SOLD!!
t206 Chase Polar Bear (Holding Trophy) PSA 2 -- $125
t206 Ball Piedmont 350-460 PSA 4 -- $95
t206 Leibhardt Piedmont 150 SGC 40 -- SOLD!!

Thanks in advance!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

I’ll take the Bender Cycle. I’ll send you an email

Hi Chuck,

Hope you are well....hate to say it but Bender sold a bit ago

Best,
Brian

** Update **

Looks like these were fairly popular....most sold fairly quickly.  Down to just Chase and Ball left needing a home -

t206 Chase Polar Bear (Holding Trophy) PSA 2 -- $150
t206 Ball Piedmont 350-460 PSA 4 -- $110

Price drop for the two remaining cards....now lowered to $125 for Chase and $95 for the Ball PSA 4

Or take both for $195 delivered! 

Thanks!!
Message sent on the Ball. I’ll take it.
Thanks everyone!  Down to just the Chase trophy card at $125.  Any takers?
